name: Loop Bulb
description:
LOOP BULB

This is a game made in 2 and a half days for the Ludum Dare 47 with the theme "Stuck in a Loop"

You impersonate a dad that is asked to fix some things for his family. If not for constant interruptions it would be an easy task.

How will you get out of the loop you will be stuck on?

Link to the LD47 page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loop-bulb

The art was made by Toni Elias including the posters. Music and sound come from music packs we had aquired previously so we opted out from that category in the Jam.
